Your tail crunches on impact as you fall onto the sand. It appears that your ordeal has left your body very weak. A whine and moans leaves your throat as the possibility of moving is useless.

"Hold on."

The man speaks softly before he gently picks you up off the ground. You blush, secretly enjoying being carried in such a manner as he hold you like a bride. Your arms weakly wrap around his neck for support as he starts to move.

154221.content:
You get to work undoing the poorly tightened rope around your arms, which is made much easier with your kitsune dexterity. You'll be out in a few minutes but you have to delay them before they enact whatever your plans are, even your superhuman skill dosnt make up for your unfortunately sub-human willpower. You make the first plea that comes to your mind, though your usual wit is somewhat thwarted in your panic, "Come on guys, I could just do some modeling for you!"

That gives the three reporters a moments pause, and they glance at each other as they think it out, giving you an extra few precious seconds to loosen the bonds around your arms enough that they no longer prevent arm movement, now just to get your hands free and your options for getting yourself out of this mess will increase tenfold, and better yet wont involve lewd pictures of you going to the public.

"You know Mia, I think a major problem with last year's year book was that it wasn't candid enough. I think Kira's natural reactions suit this years theme much better!" One of the two subordinates says. The other seems to knod along with her but Mia seems to still be thinking about your offer. Deciding to try and push her over the edge you add on, "I could get some of my friends to come over and model as well, we can fill out more of the book that way!" your worried you over sold your excitement but Mia seems to still be in thought. The girl who remained silent speaks up, "Mia, shes clearly trying to trick us, I know Jessie, shes a bit slutty but not enough to do this on a favor. Shes clearly just going to try and get us caught."

Mia comes to a decision quickly after, but it dosnt matter because...

1542211.content:
"I would have said yes to that offer, but I actually wanted to make a piece on you. I'll call it, 'Faces of Kitsune'. Girls, follow my lead." Mia walked so she was behind your head and put her camera over your face, "I'll title this one 'Scared', Could you two calm her down a bit?"

Each of the lesser photographers gently brush on of your tails, making you shivver from the sensation. The clever on notices your response and starts to stroke the tail, the effect is almost immediate as you collapse onto the table into a drug like state. The sensation neither arousing nor ticklish, instead you feel light headed and loose focus of your limbs as the girl continues to play with your tail. Noticing this, the other girl seems to take hold of more than one of your tails, your not entirely sure how many, and pets them firmly. Your mind melts into the non-sexual pleasure, your chest becoming ever heavier as you lose track of the room around you. You vaguely recognize someone petting your ear and saying, "Mmm, you like that?" A brief whiteness fills your closed eyes and the voice returns, "I think I'll call this one 'Happy'"

The next few minutes are nice and quiet, you retain a little bit more focus as their intial enthusiasm decreases, but you only have enough lucidity to babble happy nonsense to yourself as you melt in their hands. At some point you hear a door open and close, but the movement in the room barely registers as the sensations from your tail keep on coming. An odd sensation comes through as one of them begins spidering fingers along a bundle of your tails, and your face relaxes and you fall into a waking sleep, the last lucid sound you hear is, 'Ill call this one 'sleepy'"

15422112.content:
Your mind takes a few seconds to catch up with your body, by the time your lucid again the girls had been gently tickling you as they ramped down their petting. Finally able to open your eyes, you glance around and see that one of the girls is in front of the table your on, another is standing to your left, and Mia is still behind your head, a cheeky grin on her face as she sees you regain composure.

"That was fun wasn't it?" She says while she pets your ears, "But this will be much more enjoyable, wont it?". You shake your head as you try to maintain your normal breathing, but her smile just grows as she worms her fingers over your shoulders towards your armpits. The clever girl notices and decides to join in, moving her teasing hands from your upper stomach to your ribs, and gently spidering her fingers. At this point your almost sure you have a stupid smile on your face as you breath shakily, and Mia snaps another photo before finally moving her fingers to your armpits and beginning her torment. Four arms is too much, even with their careful gentleness, and you begin to quietly mew out pleas against your will, the other one by your legs smiles at this and decides its her turn to join in, tickling around your toes with her nails.

This is the straw that breaks the camels back, and you begin shaking against your bindings and full on giggling as you try and pull your feet into your body unsuccessfully. Another flash goes off the and leader stops, letting off just enough pressure for you to swallow a few breaths of air before they resume...
